tasks.task: Build a shade structure for chickens in hot weather.
subtasks: Acquire materials (three cattle panels, shade cloth, zip ties, cedar 2x4s).
Attach cattle panels to the framework.
Cover the structure with shade cloth using zip ties.
Ensure chickens are comfortable in the new structure.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Build a shade structure for chickens in hot weather.
subtasks: Acquire materials (three cattle panels, 12x20 shade cloth, zip ties, four cedar 2x4s).
Attach cattle panels to the framework.
Secure shade cloth with zip ties.
Ensure chickens are comfortable in the new structure.
